ygData.subject: Re: new alliance members

JP, keep in mind that the Alliance base is three miles out to sea. So 
your bots are either flying or swimming.

::Zardus/Future 
Zardus/Astral/Reptilica/DevilDuer/Fenox/Griplash/Havoc/Perndabot/Reckl
essa/Repressor/Starlight/Diamond::

Zardus sighs, seeing two Predacons attack the Iron Fist. Their 
attacks were nothing to be worried about, but it still added to his 
suspicions about Unitron and company. His eyes glance over to the 
scanner reports, watching something develop fairly close to Alliance 
island. His comm beeps.

"Zardus, I'm at the CF. There is a bot who looks just like Unitron 
here."

Zardus growls, tapping a few buttons. This was enough. Three seconds 
after a barely audable beep, the pipes blast open in the room that 
Unitron and his fellow bots were in, neuro-circuitry-destructive gas 
rushes to fill the room. The gas worked by seeping into any opening 
they could find in a bot (optics, mouth, nose, joints, cracks in 
armor, spaces between armor plates, etc..) and attacking any 
circuitry it touches, possibly completely destroying it. The blast 
doors of that area of the base were all closed and airtight (blast 
door every 10 feet or so, as usual). Zardus activates his comm. 
Jammers activate in the room, stopping any transmissions whatsoever 
from leaving or entering.

"All Alliance troops, there may be a revolt in sectors three through 
seven. Those sectors have been sealed off. Prepare for battle in case 
the revolt gets out of hand. Don't rush to fight yet, those sectors 
are highly dangerous at this point, but be ready."

The announcement, of course, was not heard in the room where Unitron 
and co were. Zardus taps a few more buttons and the autoguns in the 
room emerge, aiming at the crowd of bots and firing randomly.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Future Zardus looks around the battle at the CF, watching for any 
other suspicious behavior other than what he reported to Zardus a few 
seconds ago.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Astral runs out of his quarters at Zardus's transmission, his gun in 
hand and ready to be used. He wasn't too far from where the 'revolt' 
was taking place.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Reptilica sighs, looking to Zardus. "If this don't stop, I'm gonna go 
insane from all the conflicts," he says to his commander, sitting 
back in his chair, bored.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DevilDuer groans and activates his stun gun, preparing for any 
possible battle. He sits up and exits his quarters.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Fenox jumps at the announcement of a possible revolt, her gun in her 
hand in under a second. "You ready?" She asks Vlad.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Griplash drags his sleepy self out of his quarters, both missile 
launchers ready for battle. From the next room, Recklessa emerges, 
also ready to slag some bots.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The practice bots dissapear as Havoc waves his hand after Zardus's 
announcement. He looks to Demolition and Repressor.

"Well, we get to fight real life. Let's go."

Havoc exits the training room, taking out his missile launcher. 
Repressor follows with both missile launchers drawn.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Perndabot takes out his missile launchers, remaining in his seat at 
the bridge.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Starlight yawns as she exits her quarters, her charge launcher armed 
and ready to go.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
(I've tried not using Diamond as much as possible, cause I don't like 
using other people's chars, but Logo loaned her to me till she gets 
back, and this is a serious situation, so I'll RP her for now)

Diamond jumps out of her bed, running out of her room with her poison 
gun ready.






--- In nbwrpg@y..., JP3884@a... wrote:
>        Nighteyes screams, but is hit in the leg. She transforms and 
rushes to 
> the protection of the island.
> 
>        Craken arrives at the Allience Island, and begins to fire 
his dual 
> chain guns at the base, knowing he wouldnt do damage but this was 
just the 
> beginning of the plan.
> 
>        Tarantulas rerouted power to the shields. "Send the autogun 
fire, from 
> behinde the shields, at the arriving enemies." He said to Klash.
>        She responded and did so. The autoguns, from behinde the 
shields, 
> opened fire on the newly arriving bots.
> 
>        Bezerker saw Craken arrive at the Allience base, and 
scenting Hell 
> Beast on him, began to join the attack on the base.
